segment.text: Hey, Knight! Happy you made it here.
The Squire and I are trying to pinpoint the location of the @, but we are stuck by a set of barriers in a tunnel on the outskirts of the village.
The mayor knows more about the situation than I do. I'd have a talk with him if I were you.
We're getting closer to finding $. I can feel it in my bones.
You're doing great. Keep it up.
I'm going to stick near the Squire. He's been acting quite strange lately.
